description.narrative: The Project's positive development impact includes: (i) replacement of a highly-inefficient and depreciated power generation asset with a high-efficiency CCGT; (ii) helping the Armenian power sector reduce natural gas cost and ensuring reliable power supply in Armenia; and (iii) further strengthening the Armenian power sector by diversifying the investor base and increasing private sector participation.
